author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Update the macros in view of the issues in HCAL isotrack calibration. Detailed study of the MC file was required to find the real issue in the produced MC files used in the calibration.

#### PR validation:

Ran the macros on recent summer production of dip ion sample and found issues in the production

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-alca175 Update the macros in view of the issues in HCAL isotrack calibration
